data.meanings: certainty, surely, of a certainty, to be sure/certain, to ascertain, one who is certain.
data.sentence: The word الْيَقِينِ comes from the root ي ق ن and is associated with the meanings: certainty, surely, of a certainty, to be sure/certain, to ascertain, one who is certain.

data.meanings: To be right, just or fitting, worthy of, justly due to, proper, genuine, real, a fact, true, necessitated, suitable, necessary, incumbent upon, suited to the requirement of justice, become certain, authentic, deserve.
data.sentence: The word لَحَقُّ comes from the root ح ق ق and is associated with the meanings: To be right, just or fitting, worthy of, justly due to, proper, genuine, real, a fact, true, necessitated, suitable, necessary, incumbent upon, suited to the requirement of justice, become certain, authentic, deserve.
